title: BC服，登录进不去。BC端报错
author: lian123456
txt_content:
BC服，登录进不去。BC端报错

Error authenticating MS_V with minecraft.net
java.net.UnknownHostException: failed to resolve 'sessionserver.mojang.com' after 9 queries
        at io.netty.resolver.dns.DnsResolveContext.finishResolve(DnsResolveContext.java:877) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.resolver.dns.DnsResolveContext.tryToFinishResolve(DnsResolveContext.java:838) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.resolver.dns.DnsResolveContext.query(DnsResolveContext.java:333) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.resolver.dns.DnsResolveContext.tryToFinishResolve(DnsResolveContext.java:810) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.resolver.dns.DnsResolveContext.access$700(DnsResolveContext.java:63) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]

        at io.netty.util.concurrent.DefaultPromise.notifyListener0(DefaultPromise.java:502) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.util.concurrent.DefaultPromise.notifyListeners0(DefaultPromise.java:495) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.util.concurrent.DefaultPromise.notifyListenersNow(DefaultPromise.java:474) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.util.concurrent.DefaultPromise.notifyListeners(DefaultPromise.java:415) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.util.concurrent.DefaultPromise.setValue0(DefaultPromise.java:540) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.util.concurrent.DefaultPromise.setSuccess0(DefaultPromise.java:529) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.util.concurrent.DefaultPromise.trySuccess(DefaultPromise.java:101) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.resolver.dns.DnsQueryContext.setSuccess(DnsQueryContext.java:196) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.resolver.dns.DnsQueryContext.finish(DnsQueryContext.java:188) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.resolver.dns.DnsNameResolver$DnsResponseHandler.channelRead(DnsNameResolver.java:1149) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:359) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:345) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.fireChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:337) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToMessageDecoder.channelRead(MessageToMessageDecoder.java:102) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:359) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:345) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.fireChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:337) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]

        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:345) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline.fireChannelRead(DefaultChannelPipeline.java:930) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.channel.nio.AbstractNioMessageChannel$NioMessageUnsafe.read(AbstractNioMessageChannel.java:93) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.processSelectedKey(NioEventLoop.java:677) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.processSelectedKeysOptimized(NioEventLoop.java:612) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.processSelectedKeys(NioEventLoop.java:529) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.run(NioEventLoop.java:491) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at io.netty.util.concurrent.SingleThreadEventExecutor$5.run(SingleThreadEventExecutor.java:905) ~[Waterfall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.14-SNAPSHOT:1f16030:286]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_212]

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
正版服？ 

好像是 sessionserver.mojang.com 的 dns 解析出问题了，更换服务器的 dns 试试

replies.author: lian123456
replies.txt_content: bc服。但是没开启正版验证的

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
lian123456 发表于 2019-7-14 00:15
bc服。但是没开启正版验证的
尝试更换服务器的 dns 。

你这样我是收不到通知的， 你需要点击左下角的气泡我才能收到提醒。

replies.author: lian123456
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-7-14 07:05
尝试更换服务器的 dns 。

你这样我是收不到通知的， 你需要点击左下角的气泡我才能收到提醒。 ...
我是用我自己的电脑开的BC,然后映射到FRP让别人连接。极少情况下进去了，大多数都是上面的错误

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
lian123456 发表于 2019-7-14 09:32
我是用我自己的电脑开的BC,然后映射到FRP让别人连接。极少情况下进去了，大多数都是上面的错误 ...
是的，修改你电脑的 dns

replies.author: lian123456
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-7-14 09:34
是的，修改你电脑的 dns
是BC开启了正版的原因

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
lian123456 发表于 2019-7-14 22:50
是BC开启了正版的原因
所以你修改了dns没有。。

换成这个试试 http://www.alidns.com/
